summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2455, for the improvement of Highland Drive, from Dexter Avenue to Westlake Avenue North, by constructing a bridge roadway thereon, 22 feet in width, under Ordinance No. 26292 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
